actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide that certain industrial parks shall be classified as class III areas for purposes of part C of title I of the Clean Air Act.

summary.text: Amends the Clean Air Act to classify as a class III area, for purposes of provisions relating to air quality nondegradation, any area of more than 5,000 acres zoned as an industrial park, if a State determines that such classification will enhance industrial and employment expansion.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain industrial parks shall be classified as class III areas for purposes of part C of title I of the Clean Air Act.
